title: How to Use a Controller with Genshin Impact

steps.title: Connect your controller
steps.content: Connect your controller . Xbox controllers can wirelessly connect to most modern Windows gaming PCs and the Xbox Wireless Controller adapter. To do so, use their included USB-C or microUSB cable to plug them in to your PC to pair them. [1] X Research source Both Xbox One and PS4 controllers can connect to your PC via Bluetooth and by USB, but you may get latency with Bluetooth. [2] X Research source PS4 consoles only support PS4 controllers and a keyboard/mouse, not other brand controllers.

steps.title: Verify the correct drivers are installed.
steps.content: Verify the correct drivers are installed. Your device should correctly identify the controllers and install the necessary drivers. Query Windows Update for the latest device drivers. In any case, you can try pressing a few buttons to check that your controller is working correctly. [3] X Research source On PC, the system button should open the Xbox Game Bar, the joysticks should move a box cursor around, and pressing the select button or "A" should activate the current item.

steps.title: Open Genshin Impact.
steps.content: Open Genshin Impact. To do so, open the Genshin Impact launcher then click on Launch .

steps.title: Click to start the game.
steps.content: Click to start the game. The resources will download first, then a door will appear. Click when the door appears to enter Teyvat.

steps.title: Open the Paimon menu.
steps.content: Open the Paimon menu. You can do this by pressing Esc .

steps.title: Select Controller under "Control Type".
steps.content: Select Controller under "Control Type". You will notice the window shrink and your cursor disappear. On your controller, use the left joystick to select an item from the menu and ○ (PS4) or B (Xbox) to select and × (PS4) or A (Xbox) to go back. The A/B button arrangement on game menus can be changed to match what you would expect on an Xbox.

steps.title: Use the left joystick L to move your character.
steps.content: Use the left joystick L to move your character. Use the right joystick R to rotate the camera. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Press ○ or B to use a normal attack.
steps.content: Press ○ or B to use a normal attack. This will use the character's weapon to conduct an attack. Hold the button down to use a charged attack. [5] X Research source While firing with a bow, use the two other joysticks to position the crosshair until it is pointing where you want to fire.

steps.title: Press △ or Y to use Elemental Burst.
steps.content: Press △ or Y to use Elemental Burst. This will trigger a character's Elemental Burst, dealing damage to nearby enemies. This requires a cooldown and a recharge to activate. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Press × or A to jump.
steps.content: Press × or A to jump. This will make your character jump and climb. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Press □ or X to interact with objects.
steps.content: Press □ or X to interact with objects. This will open doors and chests and pick up objects, like plants or chest items.

steps.title: Use the D-pad to switch characters.
steps.content: Use the D-pad to switch characters. This will allow you to rapidly change characters so you can use certain forms of attack.

steps.title: Use the left trigger (LT/L2) to toggle aiming mode.
steps.content: Use the left trigger (LT/L2) to toggle aiming mode. This only applies if your current character is an archer.

steps.title: Use the left bumper (LB/L1) to open the Shortcut Wheel.
steps.content: Use the left bumper (LB/L1) to open the Shortcut Wheel. You can follow this up with using the right joystick to select an option. This will open a menu.

steps.title: Use the right bumper (RB/R1) to dash.
steps.content: Use the right bumper (RB/R1) to dash. Hold it to sprint. This will make your character run faster. This consumes stamina.

steps.title: Use the right trigger (RT/R2) to use Elemental Skill.
steps.content: Use the right trigger (RT/R2) to use Elemental Skill. This will activate your current character's elemental skill. There is a cooldown for using Elemental Skill.

steps.title: Press "Options" or ≡ to open the Paimon menu.
steps.content: Press "Options" or ≡ to open the Paimon menu. This will also pause the game. Here, you can select interact with different systems in Genshin Impact. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Press the touchpad or the view button to open chat.
steps.content: Press the touchpad or the view button to open chat. In co-op mode, this is how you will communicate with other players.
